creator: Sterve FZC LLC
descriptionHtml:
Sterve Business helps you launch your online store in 30 seconds. With Sterve Business's catalog maker, you can make a beautiful and professional-looking catalog on your phone and can share it easily with your customers.

With Sterve Business’s easy share option you can grow your business by sharing your beautiful catalogs on social media platforms.

How to create a catalog using Sterve Business?
Create your online store in 2 simple steps:
-Enter your Business Name
-Add products/services you want to sell

As soon as you complete these steps, your Business will be created. Now all you have do is share your shop link with the customers. To share your online Business, simply click on the share button and select the platform of your choice. For all new orders, you'll get an automatic notification with the customer's details like name, delivery address, and verified mobile number.
To accept the order, click “Accept”, and mark it “Shipped” when it on the way to the customer, we will automatically share updates with your customers. Once the order is delivered, mark it as "Delivered" to separate it from your active orders.

Who Sterve Business is for?
Sterve Business is for anyone who wants to take their business online and sell products or services through social media platforms or online messaging services.

Businesses which are using Sterve Business –
Grocery stores
Restaurants
Butchery and Seafood shops
Fruits and Vegetable stores
Dry fruit stores
Eye glass shops
Laundry and Dry Cleaning services
Travel agencies
Repairs
Furniture stores
Tailoring
Clothing, Lifestyle and Fashion stores
Beauty products stores
General trading stores
Jewellery shops
Carpets and curtains business
Pharmacy and health supplies stores
Coffee and beverage shops
Maintenance (Ac, electrician, plumber repairs)
Gym and Fitness business
Flowers, gift and toy shops
Rent a car businesses
Real estate agents

Car resellers
Books and stationary stores
Home décor and handicrafts stores
Salon, spa and beauty salons
Studio and photographer
Make up artists
Interior designer and independent makers
Tiffin and Catering services
Hobbyists and freelancers
Drop-shipping business owners
Event planners
Tutors
Workshops

Features of Sterve Business:
-Easy create online stores
-Beautiful catalogs
-Add unlimited products or services
-Set prices and quantities available
-Edit or update existing product details
-Turn on or off product availability
-Manage orders and inventory

Order Management:
-Keep track of all accepted, shipped, or delivered orders for each of your stores or business.
-Assign and separate declined or pending orders.



Review Store Performance:
-Track stats like Store views, Product/Services views, Number of Orders, and Revenue.
-View sales reports by day, week, or month
-Download your sales/income reports

Sell on Social Media:
-With Sterve Business app you can share your store on social media platforms.
-Share a specific product or catalog with your customers.

Unique Features:
-0 % fees on transactions, means we do NOT charge any commission
-Multiple devices support
-Manage your inventory and product variants easily
descriptionShort: Take business online in 30 sec. Use marketing and billing to increase the sales.

title: Manage finance & sell more

creator: Sterve FZC LLC
descriptionHtml:
It is a complete Business management application. It helps you to go online without any extra expense. You will be able to get more customers, manage your orders, inventory as well as the payments, credit reports, sales and expense reports more easily and in a very secured way.

All the features are described below :

Credit Book - Sterve Business helps you to convert your traditional paper credit book into a digital cash ledger book where you can add all you customers and add their incoming and outgoing transaction. You can also send them reminders so that you get you payments from time to time.

Sales And Expense Book - It helps you to record your daily transactions happening at your shop. Hence you can have a complete report in your hand related to the amount o money being spent and earned. This also gives you day wise report or total orders and also bills generated. You can get a CSV report downloaded.

Digital Showroom - Sterve Business helps you launch your online store in 30 seconds. With Sterve Business's catalog maker, you can make a beautiful and professional-looking catalog on your phone and can share it easily with your customers. With Sterve Business’s easy share option you can grow your business by sharing your beautiful catalogs on social media platforms.Keep track of all accepted, shipped, or delivered orders for each of your stores or business. Assign and separate declined or pending orders.

Billing - This app helps to create invoice and acts as a digital POS system. Businesses can send digital bills to their customers which are more safe and secure. It helps the shopkeepers to get business loans due to the daily sales record being tracked.

Marketing - Business can choose out of variety of business cards designs for the digital showroom and use that as a marketing tool. There are also various options of banners and promo codes to be sent to the customers to maximise the sales. Business can also generate the product catalogue which they can use it to share it among the customers so that they can view all the products at once.


Businesses which are using Sterve Business –
Grocery stores
Restaurants

title: Sterve - Manage Shop Remotely

creator: Sterve FZC LLC
descriptionHtml:
It is a complete Business management application. It helps you to go online without any extra expense. You will be able to get more customers, manage your orders, inventory as well as the payments, credit reports, sales and expense reports more easily and in a very secured way.

All the features are described below :

Credit Book - Sterve Business helps you to convert your traditional paper credit book into a digital cash ledger book where you can add all you customers and add their incoming and outgoing transaction. You can also send them reminders so that you get you payments from time to time.

Sales And Expense Book - It helps you to record your daily transactions happening at your shop. Hence you can have a complete report in your hand related to the amount o money being spent and earned. This also gives you day wise report or total orders and also bills generated. You can get a CSV report downloaded.

Digital Showroom - Sterve Business helps you launch your online store in 30 seconds. With Sterve Business's catalog maker, you can make a beautiful and professional-looking catalog on your phone and can share it easily with your customers. With Sterve Business’s easy share option you can grow your business by sharing your beautiful catalogs on social media platforms.Keep track of all accepted, shipped, or delivered orders for each of your stores or business. Assign and separate declined or pending orders.

Billing - This app helps to create invoice and acts as a digital POS system. Businesses can send digital bills to their customers which are more safe and secure. It helps the shopkeepers to get business loans due to the daily sales record being tracked.

Marketing - Business can choose out of variety of business cards designs for the digital showroom and use that as a marketing tool. There are also various options of banners and promo codes to be sent to the customers to maximise the sales. Business can also generate the product catalogue which they can use it to share it among the customers so that they can view all the products at once.

It is a complete Business management application. It helps you to go online without any extra expense. You will be able to get more customers, manage your orders, inventory as well as the payments, credit reports, sales and expense reports more easily and in a very secured way.

All the features are described below :

Digital Showroom - Sterve Business helps you launch your online store in 30 seconds. With Sterve Business's catalog maker, you can make a beautiful and professional-looking catalog on your phone and can share it easily with your customers. With Sterve Business’s easy share option you can grow your business by sharing your beautiful catalogs on social media platforms.Keep track of all accepted, shipped, or delivered orders for each of your stores or business. Assign and separate declined or pending orders.

Marketing - Business can choose out of variety of business cards designs for the digital showroom and use that as a marketing tool. There are also various options of banners and promo codes to be sent to the customers to maximise the sales. Business can also generate the product catalogue which they can use it to share it among the customers so that they can view all the products at once.

Billing - This app helps to create invoice and acts as a digital POS system. Businesses can send digital bills to their customers which are more safe and secure. It helps the shopkeepers to get business loans due to the daily sales record being tracked.

Sales And Expense Book - It helps you to record your daily transactions happening at your shop. Hence you can have a complete report in your hand related to the amount o money being spent and earned. This also gives you day wise report or total orders and also bills generated. You can get a CSV report downloaded.

Credit Book - Sterve Business helps you to convert your traditional paper credit book into a digital cash ledger book where you can add all you customers and add their incoming and outgoing transaction. You can also send them reminders so that you get you payments from time to time.

title: Sterve - Grow your Business

creator: Sterve FZC LLC
descriptionHtml:
It is a complete Business management application. It helps you to go online without any extra expense. You will be able to get more customers, manage your orders, inventory as well as the payments, credit reports, sales and expense reports more easily and in a very secured way.

All the features are described below :

Digital Showroom - Sterve Business helps you launch your online store in 30 seconds. With Sterve Business's catalog maker, you can make a beautiful and professional-looking catalog on your phone and can share it easily with your customers. With Sterve Business’s easy share option you can grow your business by sharing your beautiful catalogs on social media platforms.Keep track of all accepted, shipped, or delivered orders for each of your stores or business. Assign and separate declined or pending orders.

Marketing - Business can choose out of variety of business cards designs for the digital showroom and use that as a marketing tool. There are also various options of banners and promo codes to be sent to the customers to maximise the sales. Business can also generate the product catalogue which they can use it to share it among the customers so that they can view all the products at once.

Billing - This app helps to create invoice and acts as a digital POS system. Businesses can send digital bills to their customers which are more safe and secure. It helps the shopkeepers to get business loans due to the daily sales record being tracked.

Sales And Expense Book - It helps you to record your daily transactions happening at your shop. Hence you can have a complete report in your hand related to the amount o money being spent and earned. This also gives you day wise report or total orders and also bills generated. You can get a CSV report downloaded.

Credit Book - Sterve Business helps you to convert your traditional paper credit book into a digital cash ledger book where you can add all you customers and add their incoming and outgoing transaction. You can also send them reminders so that you get you payments from time to time.
